Cassia.name: Lightning Fury
Cassia.description: Hurl a lightning javelin that deals 175 (+4.5% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and splits into two lightning bolts that deal 175 (+4.5% per level) damage to enemies in their path.

Cassia.name: Blinding Light
Cassia.description: After 0.5 seconds, Blind enemies in the target area for 2 seconds. Passive: Cassia deals 15% increased damage to Blinded targets.

Cassia.name: Fend
Cassia.description: Charge at an enemy, and upon arriving channel for up to 1.5 seconds, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in front of Cassia every 0.25 seconds. Deals 50% reduced damage to non-Heroes.

Cassia.name: Ball Lightning
Cassia.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

Cassia.name: Valkyrie
Cassia.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

Cassia.name: Avoidance
Cassia.description: While moving unmounted, Cassia gains 65 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing the damage taken by 65%.

1.name: Charged Strikes
1.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 20% and cause Basic Attacks to bounce to nearby enemy Heroes for 8 seconds.

1.name: Thunderstroke
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Lightning Fury. Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Lightning Fury's damage by 75. Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Lightning Fury gains a 2nd charge and its Mana cost is reduced from 30 to 15.

1.name: True Sight
1.description: Quest: Damage Blinded enemy Heroes 60 times with Abilities of Basic Attacks. Reward: Increase Blinding Light's Blind duration by 1 second. Passive: Increase Blinding Light's passive damage bonus by 15%.

4.name: Inner Light
4.description: Whenever Cassia is Stunned or Rooted, Blinding Light is cast at her location. This effect has a 6 second cooldown. Passive: Blinding Light's radius is increased by 25%.

4.name: Plate of the Whale
4.description: Regenerate 5 Health per second while Avoidance is active. Quest: For every 5 Basic Attacks absorbed with Avoidance, it regenerates an additional 1 Health per second. Reward: After absorbing 75 Basic Attacks, increase Cassia's maximum Health by 10%.

4.name: Ring of the Leech
4.description: Cassia heals for 25% of the damage she deals to Blinded enemies.

7.name: Impale
7.description: Enemies below 50% Health take 50% increased damage from Fend.

7.name: Surge of Light
7.description: After taking 500 damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 225 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.

7.name: War Traveler
7.description: Cassia gains 4% Movement Speed every 0.5 seconds while Avoidance is active, up to 15%. This bonus is reset when Cassia stops moving or uses an Ability.

10.name: Ball Lightning
10.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

10.name: Valkyrie
10.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

13.name: Grounding Bolt
13.description: Lightning Fury Slows enemies hit by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Lunging Strike
13.description: Increase Fend's range and area by 20% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Seraph's Hymn
13.description: Reduce Blinding Light's Mana cost from 70 to 40. Basic Attacks against Blinded enemies reduce the cooldown of Blinding Light by 3 seconds.

13.name: Thundergod's Vigor
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the primary missile of Lightning Fury reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

16.name: Martial Law
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

16.name: Penetrate
16.description: Enemies take 3% increased damage from Fend each consecutive hit.

16.name: Pierce
16.description: The primary missile of Lightning Fury now pierces, but splits only when hitting Heroes.

20.name: Imprisoning Light
20.description: Upon impaling a Hero, Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Roots them for 3 seconds.

20.name: Infinite Lightning
20.description: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely, and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds every time an enemy Hero is hit.

20.name: Titan's Revenge
20.description: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor, and her Basic Attack range is increased by 2.
